body:
Sorry for not posting yesterday; it slipped my mind. Anyways, back again with another spotlight. If you want one of your own, fill out the application format here: https://goo.gl/forms/f9XjcBVJ5vMl72bZ2. Today's spotlightee is SamuelJacob9!

What is your username in Minecraft and what is your favourite game on Avicus?
My username is SamuelJacob9 and my favourite game on Avicus is DTM.

Introduce yourself in 3-4 sentences.
My real name is Samuel and I am 13 years old and live in Adelaide, Australia! I like playing Minecraft and other games on the computer as well. I love playing sport and hope to be a professional Aussie Rules footballer.

What are you the most excited/obsessed over at the moment?
Definitely school, we have a 2 month holiday for Christmas and school graduation.

What interests you the most in life?
AFL Football (Look it up if you don’t know what it is) great sport.

What music/art/media do you like?
Don’t really like art and music too much, do like that Trap Nation music a lot tho.

Where are you from?
I am from Cyprus (Greek Country) but live in South Australia.

What do you spend most of your time doing while on Avicus?
Talking to people, seeing if there has been any additions to the server.

Anything else you want to mention?
#makeavicusgreatagain

title: Community Spotlight #15 - SamuelJacob9
